string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Qu1) True or False: Harry Potter\'s owl is called Hedwig.
Qu2) True or False: The Deathly Hallows were given to the brothers by Death.
Qu3) True or False: Ronald Weasley has 6 older brothers.
Qu4) True or False: Harry Potter lives at Number 4, Privet Drive.
Qu5) True or False: Victor Krum is a famous Gobstones Player.
Qu6) True or False: Remus Lupin is a Vampire.
Qu7) True or False: Harry Potter\'s scar is in the shape of a lightning bolt.
Qu8) True or False: Stan Shunpike owns the Leaky Cauldron.
Qu9) True or False: Fleur Delacour\'s wand core is one of her own hairs.
Qu10) True or False: Severus Snape\'s patronus is a doe.

string-array.name: answers
string-array.item: TRUE
TRUE
FALSE
TRUE
FALSE
FALSE
TRUE
